name: UFO: Henfield
description:
A point and click puzzle adventure game set across multiple time periods. Discover and enjoy this strange and surreal story about a mysterious letter, a missing professor and a confusing mansion. With more than a hundred items, locations and objects to investigate, can you solve the mystery?



  • Enjoy this classic adventure style game with mind bending puzzles.
  • Experience dry humour and a unique hand/mouse drawn art style.
  • Explore 40 locations across three time periods.
  • Find and investigate more than 100 unique items.
  • Endure brief mini games.
  • Discover multiple endings based on your actions.



Can you unlock the secrets of Henfield?



Why is it even called that?



Is it explained.
